sentences.sContent: Choose the rattan farmland, spend the delectation and comfortable time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Choose the rattan farmland, spend the delectation and comfortable time.
sentences.sCn: 选择藤田，度过愉快与舒适的时光。

sentences.sContent: Today is Mother's Day and wish all mother festival delectation in the world!
sentences.sContent_eng: Today is Mother's Day and wish all mother festival delectation in the world!
sentences.sCn: 今天是母亲节，祝世界上所有的母亲节日愉快！

trans.tranOther: if you do something for someone’s delectation, you do it to give them enjoyment, pleasure, or amusement
